home.noItems: Your clipboard history will show up here. Copy text or images to see it appear!

hotkey.title: Global hotkey
hotkey.helperText: Use this hotkey to open the app.

privacy.dataStorageDescription: All your clipboard history is stored locally on your device in a SQLite database. Your data never leaves your computer. That also means that there is not synchronization with other devices.
privacy.noCollectionDescription: YZZO is completely offline. We do not collect any analytics, telemetry, or usage data. There are no network requests made by the app.
privacy.imageStorageDescription: Copied images are saved locally in your app data folder. They are only accessible by this application.
privacy.feedbackDescription: If you have any feature requests, bug reports, or questions, please open an issue on
